main event: A bright light was observed in the western sky in Bergenfield, New Jersey on June 8, 1966 for about 1.5-2 minutes.
interesting points: The light pulsed and changed color during the observation.
The object then moved off to the north at a rapid rate of speed, going out of sight in less than a minute.
The object appeared round or circular in shape, and seemed to be about the size of a full moon.
The light itself was very bright, white, and pulsing or flashing in intensity. Colors of red, blue, and green also seemed to be present at times.
The object was observed both by the witness and his wife, and was at an estimated altitude of perhaps 2000 to 3000 feet.
sighted object: a bright, pulsing, circular light in the sky
